unnormalised:
Hêñ, injak thãi khoj do boṛo kaṭhin.
Injak thãi do "Maraṅ bâr gachhe laga" kana, ona do hoyoto Google Maps re itik baṅ menaka.
DTDC rin kuriar hopon do mõṛe dhão fon akada!
Parchi reñji pata do menaka "Ganesh Mondir udhar re, Tin Number Lên, 7/B Ôṛak No., Purana Goa, Goa, 403402."
Unay do barsa din re inj khon ho aḍi bes haraylen tahẽkan.
Hoyoto abarak din khon do inj do GPS koordineṭ kul etohop lagit: 15.4989° N, 73.8315° E.
Pher ho, inj ren bhagya badae kate do, unay do Arapiya Sagar re jeten dâṛeya.
normalised: Hae, inah'ren ota khoj-re do bes-ge lahar-pe. In an-re "Marang banyan dare hatar-re" tahin-kana, je do Google Maps-re idin-hon bang-tahina. D-T-D-C ren courier hor monj-dhao-en-e phone-akada! Slip re address mena-a "Ganesh Mandir sapam-re, Lane pe, Orak Number elay B, Purana Goa, Goa, char sunya tin char sunya bar." Un do ror-hon-e at-lenga-yena jahan-leka ing do barha-din-re at-lenga-yena. Aka-bang, jaga-katin re ing GPS coordinates kul-sida-iya: gel-monj point char nau elay nau degree utar, satta tin point elay tin mit monj degree purub. Hon-leka-ge, inah'ren lahar baḍae-te, un do Arab Sagar-re e pahchan-a.
text:
Hêñ, injak thãi khoj do boṛo kaṭhin.
Injak thãi do "Maraṅ bâr gachhe laga" kana, ona do hoyoto Google Maps re itik baṅ menaka.
DTDC rin kuriar hopon do mõṛe dhão fon akada!
Parchi reñji pata do menaka "Ganesh Mondir udhar re, Tin Number Lên, 7/B Ôṛak No., Purana Goa, Goa, 403402."
Unay do barsa din re inj khon ho aḍi bes haraylen tahẽkan.
Hoyoto abarak din khon do inj do GPS koordineṭ kul etohop lagit: 15.4989° N, 73.8315° E.
Pher ho, inj ren bhagya badae kate do, unay do Arapiya Sagar re jeten dâṛeya.
